case 17: // second Click npc[/quote]Thanks i got it , think you can help me out with this also ? , sorry

Someone please help me it never works! and i do it correctly no errors on compiler. when people die in my server theirs no emote, they just respawn someone please tell the command code , and where i add it ?> i got hybrid pvp THANKS!
